name: #1Next Samuel Adam Brewery Boston mass
neighborhood_overview: Next to Samuel Adams Brewery & for flat rate I can pick you up in any place Boston also drop you off including Logan Airport or bus or train terminal
description:
Let me start by saying this is a small room with futon bed I recommend 1 person but you can fit two person if ur slim also has a private full bathroom connected to room you do not share this bathroom at all but you do share full kitchen Brewery Samuel Adams across the street also near Franklyn park zoo next to Bella Luna rest&bar also is next to shop,food,bars,barbershop,salon whole foods. also use grill.. this is nice place & area I also live here In apt 1 but guest will stay in apt 2.

The space
Just to sit deck bar or chair read or look all tourist to brewery & walking by people from work etc train station

Guest access
I have coin operated laundry, gym, deck or back yard small pool but fun refreshing

Other things to note
The orange line train station is Stonybrook stop
Also I want to make clear that it is only a sofa bed may not be very good for big people. Itâ€™s only a sofa bed
